mapper.select: SELECT LV.artistId, LS.liveScheduleId, LV.liveName, LS.livePlace, LS.livePrefectureCode AS livePrefecture, LS.liveDate FROM Live LV LEFT JOIN LiveSchedule LS ON LV.liveId = LS.liveId WHERE LV.artistId = #{artistId} AND LS.liveDate > #{_now} -- 現在日付より先のものを表示する ORDER BY LS.liveDate ASC LIMIT #{pageable.pageSize} OFFSET #{pageable.offset}
